data.name: RBXLeaks Dark / Black(AMOLED)
data.description:
Dark Mode for rbxleaks.com inspired by the current Roblox's Dark Mode.

USE "Customize Settings" to choose theme and then press "Update Style".

Got any suggestions? Please, use the "Send Feedback" button below.

data.description: Use with addon new tab override to choose which site to open on every new tab (like www.google.com). My own customizable theme. Allows you to change colors and background easily. Don't hesitate to send a FeedBack.
